spec_data.Name: emerald-themes-extra
spec_data.Description:
Emerald is themeable window decorator and compositing
manager for Compiz Fusion.

This package contains extra themes for emerald.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:39:52 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Themes for Emerald, a window decorator for Compiz Fusion
